qas.question: How many people visited Paris' museums and monuments in 2013?
What is Paris' top tourist attraction?
How many people visited the Louvre in 2013?
What is the most popular tourist attraction in Marne-la-Valee?

context: There were <a0_0>72.1 million<a0_0/> visitors to the city's museums and monuments in 2013. The city's top tourist attraction was the <a1_0>Notre Dame Cathedral<a1_0/>, which welcomed 14 million visitors in 2013. The Louvre museum had more than <a2_0>9.2 million<a2_0/> visitors in 2013, making it the most visited museum in the world. The other top cultural attractions in Paris in 2013 were the Basilique du Sacré-Cœur (10.5 million visitors); the Eiffel Tower (6,740,000 visitors); the Centre Pompidou (3,745,000 visitors) and Musée d'Orsay (3,467,000 visitors). In the Paris region, <a3_0>Disneyland Paris<a3_0/>, in Marne-la-Vallée, 32 km (20 miles) east of the centre of Paris, was the most visited tourist attraction in France, with 14.9 million visitors in 2013.
